dct_title_s: Le plan de Paris, ses Faubourgs et ses environs; par Guillaume de L'Isle = Platte grond van Parys, zyn voorburgen en omleggende plaatse.; Platte grond van Parys, zyn voorburgen en omleggende plaatse
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Originally published in Paris in 1716. Shows selected named buildings (some in perspective), gardens, fields. The coloring is original or early hand color. 1 map: col.; 61 x 80 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
